title: Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows Incorrect Default Permissions Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Veeam Agent for Microsoft Windows. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the product installer. The issue results from incorrect permissions on a file used by the product. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Veeam has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.veeam.com/kb4743
timeline:
2025-03-10 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-07-24 - Coordinated public release of advisory
